title: Unmasked
description: "Disturbing, dark, and sexy.""It has all the trappings of cult horror, but swims in the realm of psychological thriller.""Creepy."World-renowned pop star, Karla, summons her estranged siblings to engage in intensive therapy at the location of their parents' tragic death: a now abandoned summer camp. When fifty-year-old Karla appears looking more youthful and beautiful than ever, her siblings bitterly chalk it up to good plastic surgery and agree to stick out the month's retreat for a million dollar bonus. But psychotherapy turns psycho when family members start to uncover the twisted truth about their famous sister.
author: R. Saint Claire
